name: My Pokémon CG
description:
My Pokémon CG

1.00

Inspired by Blake Thoennes's Pokémon TCG Card Game Simulator, My Pokémon CG is my version of the game with custom cards as well as my favorite ones.  Relive the best battles or catch up for the first time! The game comes with a deck generator that you can use to build your own decks to play with (and against). I hope you enjoy it and make it your own!


Recommended resolution: 1920x1080
